amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-186 to ensure personnel of the Department of the Interior and the Forest Service involved in vegetation management decisions on transmission and distribution rights-of-way receive training on how unmanned technologies can be used to identify vegetation management needs, lower energy costs, and reduce the risk of wildfires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sinema amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Sinema.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sinema amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
